credit_line: Gift of Ruth Friedman in memory of Harry G. Friedman
title: Bowl
description: Footless bowl, tapering slightly from shoulder to base, with low neck, wide mouth, rounded lip. On cream-colored clay body, brown mat glaze ground mottled with black; four shallowly modeled flame-like forms encircling bowl mat-glazed with dark red over tan; lip and neck dark red over tan with irregular blackish-red streaking.
name: Bowl
